description: This file contains Knockout.js view model and custom bindings for a TodoMVC application, including key event handlers, data bindings, and local storage integration.

classes.name: Todo
classes.description: Represents a single todo item with observable properties for title, completion status, and editing state.

classes.name: ViewModel
classes.description: Main view model managing the list of todos, filtering, editing, and local storage synchronization.

methods.name: keyhandlerBindingFactory
methods.description: Factory function to create custom key event binding handlers for specific key codes.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds a new todo item with the current input value.

methods.name: editItem
methods.description: Sets a todo item into editing mode.

methods.name: saveEditing
methods.description: Stops editing a todo item, saves changes, or removes it if the title is empty.

methods.name: cancelEditing
methods.description: Cancels editing mode and reverts to the previous title.

methods.name: getLabel
methods.description: Returns 'item' or 'items' based on the count for display purposes.
